typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> moviesCSV
moviesCSV derive(movies = @(movieid=movie,
		title=title,
		genres=@(genre1=iif(instr(genres,'|')!=0,split(genres,'|')[1],genres),
		genre2=iif(instr(genres,'|')!=0,split(genres,'|')[2],'')),
		year=year,
		rating=Rating,
		RottenTomato={Rotton Tomato})) ~> MakeHierarchy
MakeHierarchy sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['movies.json'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> makeJSON
